issue.title: Click out of any perimeter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

If the user click outside of any perimeter (exemple : in a lake which is not part of a district), the interface displays the message "perimeter is loading" with no end.

A normal behaviour should be : the WFS response is interpreted to see that there is no perimeter in the area (the lake) and diplay the message "no perimeter in this area".

It is apparently a problem in Openlayers : the response of the WFS (if the reponse do not contain any data) is not relayed.
To verify... and eventually open an issue in openlayers forge.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0
